name: _MIND
description: For several years in the advertising world there was a debate about what advertising was and what was going to happen in the face of change. In Wroclaw, the present is the future. We have joined the previously independent, creative, strategy, social media and PR departments in one creative team. Utilizing media convergence and focusing on competence centers in creativity, we deliver solutions that are real and vibrant and not designed for the needs of the brief.
